cmdstats.description: See how often a specific command has been run or get the top 10.

command.description: The command you want to get stats for.

cmdstats.embedDescriptionOne: The {command} command has been run **{count}** times.

dashboard.description: get the link to the bots's dashboard

help.description: Show all my commands or search for a specific one

command.description: Wich command do you want to get stats about?

one.lookAtDesc: SLASH Command: look at the option descriptions.

all.embedFooterText: Use the 'command' option to get more information about a specific command.

info.description: shows some stats and infos about the bot.

invite.description: Sends a link to add the bot to your guild.
invite.embedDescription: Thank you for your interest! Click [here]({url}) to add me to your guild. ^^

average.description: Get the average ping out of 60 pings.

average.embedDescription:
Pings: `{pings}`
Lowest Ping: `{lowest}ms`
Heightest Ping: `{heightest}ms`
Average Ping: `{average}ms`

uptime.embedDescription: The bot has been [online]({Domain}/uptime) for exactly {time}.
